sentences.sentence: So we beat on boats against the current. Borne back ceaselessly into the past.
sentences.translation: 我们便努力划桨，让小舟逆流而上。一次次不停地被浪潮退回过往。

sentences.sentence: The memories we make with our family are everything.
sentences.translation: 我们和家人一起创造的记忆最为重要。

sentences.sentence: You go halfway around the world chasing something. And the whole time, it's in your own backyard.
sentences.translation: 众里寻他千百度，蓦然回首，那“物”却在灯火阑珊处。

sentences.sentence: Nothing tastes better than tangyuan on Lantern Festival.
sentences.translation: 元宵佳节，珍羞美味不如汤圆一碗。

sentences.sentence: Consider this thought when next you feel tempted to nurse a grievance: that life is too short to be little!
sentences.translation: 下次你心生怨言时，想想这一点：人生苦短休斤斤计较！
